subject: GitHub Security Alert: New SSH key added
body:
Hi developer,

A new SSH key was added to your GitHub account.

Key details:
- Title: MacBook Pro - Work
- Fingerprint: SHA256:ABC123def456...
- Added: March 15, 2024 at 14:20 UTC

If you did not add this key, please review your account security settings.

View your SSH keys: https://github.com/settings/keys

Thanks,
The GitHub Team

ai_analysis.educational_focus: This demonstrates a legitimate security notification with proper domain, specific details, and official links.
verification_tips: Verify sender domain matches official service
Check for specific technical details vs generic messages
Links should go to official service domains
Security notifications should reference specific actions

body:

body:
